synopsis.text: Charming, athletic, and sweet, Shikimori is the ultimate high school sweetheart and the perfect girlfriend to her unlucky boyfriend, Izumi. Despite being prone to accidents and misfortune, Izumi's life takes a turn for the better when he starts dating Shikimori. With her dazzling smile and kind personality, Shikimori is the epitome of cute, but when danger arises, she transforms into a cool and confident protector. Izumi can't help but fall for her even more as she saves him from one awkward situation after another. As they navigate through high school with their friends, Shikimori and Izumi's adorable and action-packed romance is sure to capture your heart. Get ready to witness the fun-filled adventures of this cute and cool couple!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
